hero.title: Bavarotti: Italian soul, Caribbean seafood, Mexican spark
hero.subtitle: Pizzas, pastas, salads, and seafood cooked to order. Fast ordering via WhatsApp.
hero.note: No online payments. Confirm and pay on delivery.
menu.title: Menu
menu.subtitle: Browse the full menu. Taxes not included (10%).
specials.title: Special Occasions
specials.subtitle: Seasonal plates and chef highlights.
about.title: Our story
about.story: From Italian roots and Dominican markets, Bavarotti blends classic recipes with coastal seafood and bold spices.
about.story2: Every dish is crafted for sharing, with handmade doughs, fresh catches, and vibrant sauces.
about.highlight3: Fresh daily and cooked to order
cart.title: Your WhatsApp order
cart.empty: Add dishes from the menu to start your order.
cart.note: We will confirm availability and delivery time.
cart.helpTitle: Need catering or a large order?
cart.helpText: Message us your guest count and timing. We will curate a seaside feast.

footer.title: Bavarotti
footer.subtitle: Coastal Italian cuisine, crafted for quick WhatsApp ordering.

admin.description: Enter the one-time passcode to update JSONBin content.
admin.instructions: Paste updated JSON and save to JSONBin. Changes reflect instantly.
